entry.title: Ideal Innovations 60-6889 - Knuffi Model B+ Edge B/Y 1M
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ideal Innovations
Type: Knuffi Bumper Guards
Price: 65.17

[shortdesc]
  • Knuffi Warning and Protective Bumper Guards act as a buffer zone for people, machines and objects
  • absorbing impacts and preventing injury and damage
  • Knuffi B profile just got bigger with a larger B+ profile option
  • Available in Black and Yellow and Black IM Profiles.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Ideal Innovations
    Color Black, Yellow
    Origin Country Germany
    Product Type Knuffi Bumper Guards

    Product Information

  • Warning and protective bumper guards effectively prevent impact damage and protect your buildings, furnishings and equipment.
  • They absorb even the hardest impacts, effectively reducing the risk of damage to property or injury to personnel.
  • Knuffi are used indoors and outdoors along walls, in corridors, on doorway edges, on furniture and on machinery.
  • Knuffi B+ offers a larger version to the B Profile.
    		•

entry.title: Open Road Harvik VS1000 - Harvik byDoorstop
entry.summary:
Vendor: Open Road
Type: Doorstop
Price: 2.19

[shortdesc]

Harvik by Viking Doorstop

  • 100% non-marring Nitrile Butadiene Rubber door stop
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Open Road
    Line Harvik
    Product Type Doorstop

    Extra Product Information

  • 100% non-marring Nitrile Butadiene Rubber Resistant against: chemicals, oil, fuel, fire, ozone, and UV 15 x 3 x 4 cm (5.9 x 1.2 x 1.6 in.) Ideal for residential and commercial use 2 doorstops per unit Assorted colours

    • Suggested Application

  • Commercial and residential use Factories, warehouses, offices, and apartments
    		•

entry.title: Ideal Innovations 60-5091 - 24 Inch Track Guard Left Side
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ideal Innovations
Type: Track Guards
Price: 76.53

[shortdesc]
  • The Ideal InnovationLeft Track Guard is made of 7-gauge steel for strength, has a safety yellow powder-coat finish for visibility and to resist corrosion, and helps protect the right track of a hinged overhead door from damage by forklifts and other motorized warehouse equipment
  • The track guard projects 7 Inch from the wall and has an L-shaped floor plate that measures 9 x 8 inches (W x D)
  • (W is width, the horizontal distance from left to right
  • D is depth, the horizontal distance from front to back.) The wall flange is drilled for four 1/2 Inch anchors (sold separately) and the floor plate is drilled for three 1/2 Inch anchors (sold separately).
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Ideal Innovations
    Color Yellow
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Track Guards

    Product Information

  • Designed specifically for Sectional Doors.
  • Wall and floor mounted, these 7-gauge steel guards offer door track protection from every angle.
  • Floor/wall anchors not included.
    		•

entry.title: Ideal Innovations 60-5720 - Column Guard: 8 Inch High Quarter Section
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ideal Innovations
Type: Column Guard
Price: 197.29

[shortdesc]
  • Prevent column impacts and the potential for major structural damage
  • Unlike conventional column guarding methods, Ideal Innovations Column Guard stops the forklift (pallet truck, and other warehouse vehicles) from impacting the column or transferring the impact load.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Ideal Innovations
    Color Yellow
    Origin Country Canada
    Product Type Column Guard

    Product Information

  • 8 Inch high and manufactured from 3/16 Inch thick steel and 3/8 Inch gussets high strength cold rolled steel.
  • Can stop 10,000lb forklift travelling at 3 to 4 mph dead in its tracks.
  • Painted Safety Yellow for high visibility.
    		•

entry.summary:
Vendor: Ideal Innovations
Type: Knuffi Bumper Guards
Price: 174.94

[shortdesc]
  • Knuffi warning and protective bumper guards act as a buffer zone for people, machines and objects
  • absorbing hard impacts and preventing injury and damage.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Ideal Innovations
    Color Black, Yellow
    Origin Country Germany
    Product Type Knuffi Bumper Guards

    Product Information

  • Highly visible black and yellow markings offer permanent warning in dangerous areas.
  • High quality manufacturing process prevents colour deterioration and guarantees long life.
  • Simple Inchpeel-away Inch adhesive installation on grease-free surfaces.
  • Excellent temperature range from -40 to +212 degrees F (-40 to 100 degrees C).
